subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Donte Greene had 21 points and Syracuse switched from its trademark zone defense to man-to-man in the second half in an 89-77 victory over visiting South Florida on Saturday.
snippet: Donte Greene had 21 points and Syracuse switched from its trademark zone defense to man-to-man in the second half in an 89-77 victory over visiting South Florida on Saturday.
